root: ^Your friends are already entertaining your little brother
^Reon:		“Just a little. I’m ready to become the best fighter of all time!”
^Frowin:	“woah, slow down, that will take a lot of time- especially as you’re just starting out.”
^Reon:		“You’ll see, my training with our scarecrow has taught me a lot already!”
^You and your friends can’t help but laugh a little
^Hilda:		“Then show us what you’ve got, little fighter!”
